explains: v. （人或动物）惨死，猝死；湮灭，毁灭；（木头、橡胶、食物等）腐烂，腐败；<英，非正式> 经受酷寒
wordGroup: perish the thought 打消念头

sentences.en: Most of the butterflies perish in the first frosts of autumn.
sentences.cn: 大多数蝴蝶在秋季初霜来临时死亡。

sentences.en: We are genetically programmed to disintegrate and perish, even under ideal conditions.
sentences.cn: 我们生来就注定要分解死亡，即使在理想的条件下也是如此。

sentences.en: Me get married? Perish the thought!
